plot: A black hole is about to swallow the world, and with only one day left, sixteen-year-old Celia must decide how to spend it.
title: Black Hole
plot_es: A black hole is about to swallow the world, and with only one day left, sixteen-year-old Celia must decide how to spend it.
plot_en: A black hole is about to swallow the world, and with only one day left, sixteen-year-old Celia must decide how to spend it.
